product_name: prAna Talon Mock Neck Top - Men's
long_description: The prAna Talon Mock Neck top goes on easy and keeps you comfortable during the yoga warm-up. Polyester fabric combines moisture wicking, quick drying performance with 4-way stretch. Mesh back provides high ventilation, and flatlock seams move with you during activity. Zipper allows easy ventilation. The performance fit of the prAna Talon Mock Neck top is designed for activity.
short_description: The prAna Talon Mock Neck top goes on easy and keeps you comfortable during the yoga warm-up.
